name: Number Bombs
description:
Number bombs are falling from the sky! Shoot them down by quickly solving arithmetic equations, before they hit the ground!

  • several difficulty levels to choose from, each with different bomb frequency, different mathematical operations (summation, substraction, multiplication, division) and different number caps
  • custom difficulty option
  • fit both for school children and adults
  • high scores to keep track of your proggress
  • lasers and lots of explosions!

NOTE:

This game is still in development, there are some features yet to come.
